titleStmt.title: An apologie of the churches in New-England for church-covenant, or, A discourse touching the covenant between God and men, and especially concerning church-covenant ... sent over in answer to Master Bernard, in the yeare 1639 ...
titleStmt.author: Mather, Richard, 1596-1669.
Peters, Hugh, 1598-1660.
Davenport, John, 1597-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.P. and M.S. for Benjamin Allen,

notesStmt.note: Written by Richard Mather and edited by Hugh Peters. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
The apologie and the answer were both published in Mather's Church-government and church-covenant discussed. 1643.

Film lacks: An answer of the elders of the severall churches in New-England unto nine positions, sent over to them (by divers reverend and godly ministers in England) to declare their judgements therein, written in the yeer 1639, and now published for the satisfaction of all who desire resolution in those points / by John Davenport. London : Printed by T.P. and M.S. for B. Allen, 1643 (p. 49-78).
